pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hemodynamic Response Functions for fMRI Data Analysis // Creates, manipulates, and evaluates hemodynamic response functions and event-related regressors for functional magnetic resonance imaging data analysis. Supports multiple basis sets including Canonical, Gamma, Gaussian, B-spline, and Fourier bases. Features decorators for time-shifting and blocking, and efficient convolution algorithms for regressor construction. Methods are based on standard fMRI analysis techniques as described in Jezzard et al. (2001, ISBN:9780192630711).
